items.title: API Connectivity and Validation
items.description: E-001: API Connectivity and Validation epic. Ensures the app can connect to and validate the Project Index API.

items.title: Project Discovery and Search
items.description: E-002: Project Discovery and Search epic. Enables users to browse and search through their projects.

items.title: Project Open and Redirection
items.description: E-003: Project Open and Redirection epic. Handles opening projects via external URL redirection to ChatGPT.

items.title: iOS OS-Level Integrations
items.description: E-004: iOS OS-Level Integrations epic. Provides Spotlight and Share Sheet integration for quick project access.

items.title: Favorites and Recents
items.description: E-005: Favorites and Recents epic. Allows users to view and manage favorite and recently accessed projects.

items.title: Desktop Integrations
items.description: E-006: Desktop Integrations epic. Extends OS-level integration to desktop platforms.

items.title: Hosted Index Service
items.description: E-007: Hosted Index Service epic. A hosted version of the Project Index API (deferred).

items.title: As a user, I can configure a base API URL
items.description:
US-001: As a user, I can configure a base API URL.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given an invalid API URL
When validation is attempted
Then an error state is shown

items.title: As a user, I can verify API compatibility
items.description:
US-002: As a user, I can verify API compatibility.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given a reachable API
When `/meta` is called
Then required fields are validated

items.title: As a user, I can view all projects
items.description:
US-003: As a user, I can view all projects.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given a valid API
When the project list loads
Then projects are displayed

items.title: As a user, I can search projects
items.description:
US-004: As a user, I can search projects.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given a query
When search is executed
Then matching projects are returned

items.title: As a user, I can open a project
items.description:
US-005: As a user, I can open a project.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given a project selection
When open is triggered
Then the `open_url` is opened externally

items.title: As a user, I can find projects via Spotlight
items.description:
US-006: As a user, I can find projects via Spotlight.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given indexed projects
When I search in Spotlight
Then relevant projects appear

items.title: As a user, I can open projects from Share Sheet
items.description:
US-007: As a user, I can open projects from Share Sheet.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
Given any app
When I select the Explorer action
Then the project opens

items.title: As a user, I can view recent projects
items.description: US-008: As a user, I can view recent projects.

items.title: As a user, I can view favorite projects
items.description: US-009: As a user, I can view favorite projects.

items.title: Raycast Extension for Project Search
items.description: Implement a Raycast extension that provides Command-K style quick search and open for ChatGPT projects. Supports both custom API and Supabase REST API (per ADR-003). User configures API URL via Raycast preferences.
